message.name: ERR_SUMMARYVIEWFIELDDEFINITION_FV_LISTGROUP_LINKTEXT_RDONAME
message.locale: One of either Link Text or RDO Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SUMMARYVIEWFIELDDEFINITION_FV_LISTGROUP_LINKTEXT_RDONAME_ONE
message.locale: Only one of Link Text or RDO Name may be entered.

message.name: ERR_SUMMARYVIEWFIELDDEFINITION_FV_LISTGROUP_LINKED_SUMMARY_VIEW_MANDATORY
message.locale: Linked Summary View is mandatory when Field Type is Linked.

message.name: ERR_SUMMARYVIEWFIELDDEFINITION_FV_LISTGROUP_NORMAL_FIELD_TYPE
message.locale: Link Text should not be entered when Field Type is Normal.

message.name: ERR_SUMMARYVIEWFIELDDEFINITION_FV_LISTGROUP_NORMAL_FIELD_LINKED_SUMMARY_VIEW
message.locale: Linked Summary View should not be entered when Field Type is Normal.

messages.message: The Description ID in the selected List RDO should be same as Description ID in the List RDO of the Linked Summary View.;

message.name: ERR_SUMMARYVIEWFIELDDEFINITION_XRV_LISTGROUP_LINKED_SUMMARY_VIEW_GROUP_TYPE
message.locale: The selected Linked Summary View should have Linked Group Type defined.

message.name: ERR_SUMMARYVIEWFIELDDEFINITION_XRV_LISTGROUP_LISTRDO
message.locale: Same List RDO should be used to define all fields for a List type of Group.

message.name: ERR_SUMMARYVIEWFIELDDEFINITION_XRV_LINKEDGROUP_DESCRIPTION_ID
message.locale: Description ID should be same as Description ID of previously added List RDO.
